website_summaries.verdict: We love this small set aimed at children 8 and older. Excellent introduction to the “Halo” line.
pros: Great value for a 116-piece set that will entertain for months
Comes with a detailed, highly posable miniature action figure and battle accessories
cons: This could open the door to more expensive Halo sets

customer_reviews.title: Great model with few cons
customer_reviews.text: Very nice one, I prefer the looking of the front, compared to the other models of Ghosts, it's really bigger as well. Unfortunately so big that the the head of the elite, (supposed to see) is barely over the top of the fuselage when sitting, which doesn't seem's very natural. I managed to have a better positioning, by tweaking with the little stirrup for his feets, he's not "sitting" anymore, but this looks really better from the front ! The back of the ghost is also a bit "botched" compared to the impressive front ! Anyways, as a collectionner, I really like the over-whole looking, it is really nice and imposing !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mega Bloks Rock
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't find this 'ghost' locally, so I got it for my son from Amazon as a surprise. It took him all of 10 mins to put it together, but he plays with it all the time. It apparently goes with a huge Mega Bloks set "Spirit Dropship" he got for the holidays. ~Can't go wrong with anything from Mega Bloks or is "Halo" based.
customer_reviews.author: The Frassy Family

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but. ......
customer_reviews.text: Another fantastic set by mega bloks. I only paid 10 dollars for this set. I can honestly say every penny was worth it. I like the mini figure that it comes with (Jul Mdama). Very nice detail in the figure. However when you get to the ghost the plasma guns aren't in the translucent blue like they were on the last ghost. It's bigger that the last one. I think the ghost is fine but the real reason I got this was for the minifigure.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: My son will love it but it looks so small under the tree
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the size. It's smaller than a Nintendo DS box. I mean, it would be cause the parts are small but I just didn't realize. My son will love it but it looks so small under the tree. Not really a review on the product itself just appears to be bigger in the picture. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really cool.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson and it is now on display on his table with the rest of his Halo collection. Really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids Lego set
customer_reviews.text: Fun little set that my 10 year old built by himself in about half an hour
customer_reviews.author: Amber Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Just what you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this set and built it rather quickly. He definitely recommends it to block builders!
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Mega Review2
customer_reviews.text: This was also purchased for the same boy from the giving tree. As I said I hope they are what he wanted, as he only stated Mega Bloks. I am sure he will enjoy many hours of building and playing with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise a good product. My son lives halo so this was ...
customer_reviews.text: Scale between vehicle and mini figure is a little off, but otherwise a good product. My son lives halo so this was perfect for him. I just wish mega block instructions weren't so horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Nopepon

customer_reviews.title: Teen Approved
customer_reviews.text: Great set. All pieces accounted for and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiFar83

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a kid who loves Halo! He enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: JessieJ

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother for Christmas, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Phoenix 013

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice.
customer_reviews.text: My son asked me for this to add to his Halo collection. Its small but made well.
customer_reviews.author: DianeS9

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, go to any retailer and compare, great value
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Pernicano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it. Great buy. Didn't have to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis A.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas for my son and absolutely loves it. Put it together and added it to his Lego collection
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Morris

customer_reviews.title: The details are so well done that it looks exactly like the ones in the game
customer_reviews.text: Really well done set that is hard to break. The details are so well done that it looks exactly like the ones in the game. Jul M'dama is printed with really cool armor pieces and an exclusive helmet that you can only get with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this. It was just what he wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Satterthwaite

customer_reviews.title: Can't lost with these.
customer_reviews.text: You really can't lose with these sets if your child likes them. My son absolutely LOVES these!!
customer_reviews.author: Airjeni

customer_reviews.title: Easy build nice product!
customer_reviews.text: My son liked this piece and it took a little under 20 minutes to put together and looks really great next to his other Halo pieces!
customer_reviews.author: LauraG

customer_reviews.title: shipping
customer_reviews.text: This gift arrived today Dec. 18th; I was very pleased. I trust that our grandson will be pleased also. This was a high priority on his list. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality reasonable price and super simple build great character too
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tinkham

customer_reviews.title: Neat, cute little thing!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, the ghost was easy and fun to put together. Mdama himself looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Joel McIntire

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so Mega Blocks aren't LEGOs, so don't expect them to be. The instructions can be a little difficult to follow, but we managed to get it right the second time. The quality of plastic isn't the same as LEGO, but again these are a different, slightly cheaper brand. The set had all the pieces and everything is as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better build, but not improved enough to justify price points
customer_reviews.text: Not much of an improvement from other ghosts. I unfortunately have to remove a star as this is another entry to the ghosts that really doesn't add too much. Pros: - Improved design - More detail then the past - Covenant Leader comes with this. Cons: - Not much different, don't see a greater need to buy this over previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell the Halo FanTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This ghost has a extremely soild build. It's is very accurate to the in game ghost. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Jul 'Mdama figure but the ghost was missing ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the Jul 'Mdama figure but the ghost was missing some pieces luckly I had some stuff to customize it with
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jorfan

customer_reviews.title: My son enjoyed building this
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoyed building this. Megabloks are not the best. They are not as good as lego. The pieces just don't always fit like they should. But lego does not make Halo building sets, so there you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty gnarly
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, my brother loved this and it was a very easy build. Great price for the 5 dudes and truck. Liked the NMPD guys but the brutes didn't have the super possible joints like the police did. Overall really great set
customer_reviews.author: FDman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: guys head doesnt fit in the cabin of the ghost and sticks out the top
customer_reviews.author: liam koralek

product_meta.title: Mega Bloks Halo Covenant Commander Building Set
product_meta.description: Mega Bloks Halo H5 Ganymede: Based on the hit video game series, Halo. Collect all your favorite Mega Bloks Halo sets, each sold separately.
